messages.subject: I found the bob books
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you, I found them, and I m just minutes away from The Homeschool (homeschool supply store in Arlington WA). The set is $15.95. Brynn~
messages.messageBody:
Thank you, I found them, and I'm just minutes away from The Homeschool
(homeschool supply store in Arlington WA). The set is $15.95.

Brynn~

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] reading/Bob books
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/29/00 6:31:19 PM Central Standard Time, ... I believe the Bob books come 12 in set 1 and 8 books each in sets 2 and 3. I found a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/29/00 6:31:19 PM Central Standard Time,
Natrlmama@... writes:

> we got ours in a set of 12 for 19.95 I think through scholastic

I believe the Bob books come 12 in set 1 and 8 books each in sets 2 and 3. I
found a Scholastic catalog with the books in them for $14.95 each set plus
shipping. It was in the Supplementary Materials 2000 catalog. You can call
them at 1-800-scholastic and ask for a catalog. Someone correct me if I'm
wrong, though. I don't have the Bob books yet but I have been searching for
some.
You could also try the veg board. I know people sell them once in awhile on
there.
I've heard that they are really neat books!
Lisa

we got ours in a set of 12 for 19.95 I think through scholastic.
Kathy
